title: Request for Service Records (Legal)
description: A customer is requesting their complete call and data usage history for legal purposes.

tasks.description: Authenticate the customer's identity with a high level of scrutiny.
Explain the process for requesting official records and any associated fees.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the formal process.

tasks.description: Create a formal service record request ticket and escalate it to the legal compliance team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates and escalates the ticket correctly.
